name: Mechanical Engineering Intelligence
author: Huitzo
description: Replace spreadsheets and reference manuals with intelligent commands. Automate recurring mechanical engineering calculations including stress analysis, torque calculations, unit conversions, material property lookups, and fastener selection—supporting both SI and Imperial units with instant results.
features: Stress and strain analysis for shafts, beams, and structural components
Torque and power transmission calculations with safety factors
Bidirectional unit conversion between SI and Imperial systems
Material property database with mechanical and thermal characteristics
Fastener selection and bolt joint analysis with preload calculations
Thermal expansion and heat transfer analysis
